Release notes for Kendo UI Professional v2018.1.117

Components

What's new

  • Update Angular to version 1.6.6
  • ObservableArray functions are missing support for thisArg (#1465)
  • Unified height of inputs and buttons
  • Using Vue components in the templates of the Vue wrappers (#3704)
  • Update JSZip to version 2.6.1
  • Update Pako_deflate to version 1.0.6
  • Update jQuery version to 1.12.4

What's fixed

  • When a ListBox is initialized in a page after a Calendar widget, it breaks the Calendar selection (#3719)
  • Wrong semicolon in the styles/common/font-icons.less of RTL expand icon rule (#3705)
  • Box-sizing issue in window on mobile (#3552)
  • Some theme resources are not found for SASS themes

AutoComplete

What's fixed

  • Inconsistent AutoComplete and ComboBox height within ToolBar template in IE (#3613)
  • Widget highlights first item incorrectly (#2146)

Button

What's fixed

  • Unexpected focusing of disabled Button initialized from element other than button (#3902)
  • Unexpected hover effect over disabled buttons icons in Material themes

Calendar

What's fixed

  • Inconsistency in the border-radius of the calendar container in the Calendar widget and the DatePicker popup in Bootstrap theme (#2794)

Chart

What's fixed

  • legend item hover results in error for line series and log axis when there are not positive points (#3790)
  • Highlight overlays other bubbles (#3664)

ComboBox

What's fixed

  • Cascade event is fired without changing the widget value (#1738)
  • ComboBox cascadeFromField does not allow cascade from a field not set as dataValueField (#3732)
  • k-state-selected class not applied to selected item in ComboBox/DropDownList if minLength is set (#3699)
  • ComboBox syncValueAndText set to false is not respected if the custom value is selected by pressing Enter (#3682)
  • ComboBox change event fires after filtering and selection of a previously selected item (#3650)
  • Clear Button in MultiSelect and ComboBox is displayed, even if there is no selected item (nothing to clear) (#3645)
  • Inconsistent AutoComplete and ComboBox height within ToolBar template in IE (#3613)
  • ComboBox does not filter the data based on the text in its input if minLength is not set (#3560)
  • Combobox item value is empty when the text contains \r\n and syncValueAndText is false (#3403)
  • Focusing the ComboBox with the keyboard and filtering it applies "k-state-focused" class to the wrong item (#3356)
  • ComboBox value not retained with syncValueAndText: false (#3144)
  • Not fired cascade event, when selection is changed to the already selected item (#2954)
  • Virtualized ComboBox throws js error in MVVM scenario. (#2677)
  • Inconsistent items selection when ComboBox suggest property is true and filtering is applied (#3811)

ContextMenu

What's fixed

  • Content within an item is not showing in Menu and ContextMenu (#3660)

DataSource

What's new

  • DataSource component should be able to dynamically change and update the widget (#3674)

DatePicker

What's fixed

  • Inconsistency in the border-radius of the calendar container in the Calendar widget and the DatePicker popup in Bootstrap theme (#2794)
  • Space key closes pickers popup.
  • Bottom line of DatePicker is not visible in Safari with some of the skins.

DateTimePicker

What's fixed

  • Space key closes pickers popup.

Draggable

What's new

  • Add Draggable container string option (#3877)

What's fixed

  • draggable container feature does not work as expected in AngularJS (#1435)

DropDownList

What's fixed

  • Open, close and refresh causing the dropdown to reopen (#3918)
  • ComboBox cascadeFromField does not allow cascade from a field not set as dataValueField (#3732)
  • k-state-selected class not applied to selected item in ComboBox/DropDownList if minLength is set (#3699)
  • Not fired cascade event, when selection is changed to the already selected item (#2954)

Editor

What's fixed

  • Iframe content is not focused with Tab when initialized in a modal Window (#3734)
  • Br tags are not preserved as new lines when Editor's pasteCleanup keepNewLines is set to true (#3720)

Grid

What's new

  • Multi check filter to work with null values (#3284)
  • Add iconClass API for Update and Cancel command buttons in grid

What's fixed

  • Checkboxes are not aligned to the label in popup edit form.
  • columns.selectable not working with multiple grids on the same page (#3783)
  • Grid editing does not work with nested array column fields (#3776)
  • The pager buttons of the Adaptive grid are not visible for Flat theme in IE11 (#3767)
  • The numeric buttons in the pager of the Adaptive grid are not rendered correctly for some Less themes (#3766)
  • The Cancel button icon is missing in the column menu filter UI for the Adaptive grid. (#3765)
  • Column menu text is not visible for some themes in the Adaptive grid (#3764)
  • The numeric pager field of the Adaptive grid is not positioned correctly for some Less themes (#3763)
  • Filtered Grid with enabled Virtual scrolling break the delete functionality with Batch editing (#3753)
  • Grid columnMenu filtering throws an exception when a column is filtered two times and the field contains a dot (#3714)
  • The last row is not visible when the horizontal scrollbar is shown after column resize. (#3709)
  • The columns container in the Grid ColumnMenu is not scrollable with the mousewheel. (#3687)
  • Grid filtering will boolean fields is not working as expected when the field is null (#3668)
  • MinResizableWidth should be enforced on double click (#3477)
  • Grid Pager numbers cover bottom Grid row preventing selection on small screens (#3387)
  • Adaptive Grid demo does not show next/prev buttons in IE11 (#3357)
  • Scrollbar "gap" in Grid header in Bootstrap LESS theme (#3314)
  • The clear button in the Adaptive Grid demo is not centered. (#3288)
  • The wrong icon is displayed in a boolean column of the adaptive Grid. (#2718)
  • Inconsistent bottom border in the grid last row in type-material themes (#2663)
  • In the mobile Grid' filter menu, the options AND and OR does not appear as selected(Flat theme). (#2602)
  • Grid autoFitColumn fails if columns grouped and expanded (#1805)
  • The editing of the virtualized Grid is not working if after filtering the number of items is less then the pageSize.
  • Grid Dirty span misaligned with column template
  • Redundant pager buttons in MVC grid
  • An incorrect dataItem is returned when using the built-in checkbox column and endless scrolling. (#3894)

ListView

What's fixed

  • Fix material design textbox height for Firefox (#2511)

Menu

What's fixed

  • Content within an item is not showing in Menu and ContextMenu (#3660)

MultiSelect

What's fixed

  • Unable to delete selected MultiSelect items when autoClose is true and filtering is applied (#3761)
  • Change and Deselect events should be triggered once when the Clear button of the MultiSelect is clicked and t here are multiple items selected. (#3872)
  • MultiSelect value cannot be cleared programmatically if an item is selected after filtering the data (#3788)
  • values are not selected with virtualization and autoBind: "false" (#3911)
  • Token with string empty for dataTextField are not displayed correctly in MultiSelect (#3723)
  • Clear Button in MultiSelect and ComboBox is displayed, even if there is no selected item (nothing to clear) (#3645)
  • Pressing Ctrl+A does not deselect all items, when they are already selected.

NumericTextBox

What's fixed

  • Decimals are lost in NumericTextBox when culture which decimal mark is coma and factor is used. (#3838)

PDF Export

What's fixed

  • e.matches error with PDF Export (#3861)

Pager

What's fixed

  • The disabled icon in the Grid pager with Metro Theme is not visible on hover (#2764)
  • Disabled Pager button arrows appearance is changed on hover

PopOver

What's fixed

  • The background and the items in the popover navbar have the same color.(Theme office365) (#2711)

Scheduler

What's new

  • Drag and drop of multiple events

What's fixed

  • if workWeekEnd option is set to be greated than 7, the page hangs
  • Recurrence events are not shown with ShowBusinessHours or startTime set (#3685)
  • Scheduler workDayStart and workDayEnd is not displayed for the current day (#3663)
  • No indication for event presence on dates after the first one in adaptive Scheduler Month view on mobile phone (#3232)
  • TimelineWeek and timelineWorkWeek views are not rendered properly when an event start time is exactly on the business day end time (#2795)
  • Only first row receives middle row class (#2671)
  • Appointments are not properly positioned in monthview
  • Scheduler's refresh button data-name value is "undefined" (#3774)

Spreadsheet

What's new

  • Improved array formulas support in Spreadsheet (#3691)
  • Pressing the arrow keys during editing navigates to neighboring cells (#3644)

What's fixed

  • Spreadsheet is adding underline styles after second server-side import of the same server-side exported file (#2143)
  • Opening an XLSX file in Spreadsheet creates a new <input type="file">, without removing the mark-up of the previous one (#3802)
  • Cell validation button focuses next available cell when there are exactly 2 columns following it (#3769)
  • Spreadsheet "No border" button icon missing (#3747)
  • Spreadsheet with frozen columns throws js error when there are more than 50 columns and cells are scrolled to the far right-hand side of the sheet (#3713)
  • Wrong cursor appearance on hovering spreadsheet's range resize indicator in IE and Edge (#3533)
  • Wrong number rounding when cell format is applied to a formula (#3520)
  • Spreadsheet active cell drag handle is hidden underneath frozen row/column borders (#3254)
  • It is possible to clear the value of disabled Spreadsheet cells (#3831)

Switch

What's fixed

  • Part of the offLabel is visible when the switch is checked (#3229)

TabStrip

What's fixed

  • Styles of left positioned tabstrip get overridden when nested in tabstrip (#3055)

ToolBar

What's new

  • Update toolbar overflow button icon from arrow to the three-points vertical one (#3703)

What's fixed

  • Home/End button do not move caret to the start/end of a textbox inside ToolBar templated item (#3876)
  • Disabled ToolBar button in a buttonGroup is hidden (#3684)
  • Inconsistent AutoComplete and ComboBox height within ToolBar template in IE (#3613)
  • Togglable buttons do not persist their state when put in a split button (#1479)
  • ToolBar's open and close events are fired only if a SplitButton popup is expanded/collapsed by clicking on the toggle button

TreeView

What's fixed

  • Unexpected TreeView node check/uncheck behavior when nodes or their checkboxes are disabled and checkChildren is true (#3816)
  • TreeView disabled nodes can be checked/unchecked (#3758)
  • After drag and drop in a TreeView with disabled checkChildren, indeterminate state is applied on a checkbox of parent which holds both checked and unchecked nodes (#3729)
  • Disabled TreeView node on click navigates to the url set to the node (#3406)
  • Treeview expand/collapse icons are fipped improperly in RTL

Upload

What's fixed

  • Files with long names selected in the Upload overflow on window resize (#3021)
  • Percentage value overlaps the name of the uploaded file on a mobile device (#2640)

Window

What's fixed

  • Memory Leak in IE11 with kendoWindow, when the widget is opened and closed multiple times (#3815)
  • Kendo Window fires close event twice on Esc keydown (#3780)
  • Iframe content is not focused with Tab when initialized in a modal Window (#3734)
  • The page vertical scrollbar is not restored on closing maximized window (#3701)
